item.title: Holy Week Scripture Readings
item.dc:creator: GR 'Scott' Cundiff
item.description:
Holy Week Scripture Readings Sunday: Mark 11:1-11 Monday: Mark 11:12-19 Tuesday: Mark 11:20-33 Wednesday: nothing recorded, but Mark 13 is a good one to read Thursday: Mark 14 Friday: Mark 15 Saturday: Jesus’ Body in the tomb Sunday: Mark 16:1-7

The post Holy Week Scripture Readings first appeared on Pastor Scott's Ministerially Speaking.
item.content:encoded:
Holy Week Scripture Readings
Sunday: Mark 11:1-11
Monday: Mark 11:12-19
Tuesday: Mark 11:20-33
Wednesday: nothing recorded, but Mark 13 is a good one to read
Thursday: Mark 14
Friday: Mark 15
Saturday: Jesus’ Body in the tomb
Sunday: Mark 16:1-7

The post Holy Week Scripture Readings first appeared on Pastor Scott's Ministerially Speaking.
